meanings.definition: A unit of electrical conductance equal to one thousandth of a mho.
meanings.sent1: The farmer measured the soil's millimhos to determine its fertility.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used millimhos to calculate the conductivity of the solution.
meanings.sent3: The millimhos in the soil were like tiny conductance detectives.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of millimhos was as bright as a lightning bolt.
meanings.sent5: The concept of millimhos sparkled in her mind like a constellation of stars.

meanings.definition: A measure of the fertility of soil based on its electrical conductivity.
meanings.sent1: The farmer checked the millimhos of the soil to assess its fertility.
meanings.sent2: High millimhos in the field indicated rich soil for planting.
meanings.sent3: The millimhos of the garden soil whispered secrets of its productivity.
meanings.sent4: Her garden flourished under the watchful eye of millimhos.
meanings.sent5: The millimhos of the earth hummed with the promise of abundant harvests.
